gym_denki_010_receptionist_02:
Let me register you as a challenger. Your name is
[trnm:0], yes?
gym_denki_010_receptionist_03:
Great! Now, in order to face Gym Leader Iono,
you’ll first need to pass the Gym Test.
gym_denki_010_receptionist_04:
Here at the Levincia Gym, that means [clr:6]starring in[clr:0]
[clr:6]one of Iono’s streams[clr:0]!
gym_denki_010_receptionist_05:
Iono’s a streamer as well as a Gym Leader, so
we want you to dazzle her audience with your\r
skills and rack up those subscriptions!
gym_denki_010_receptionist_06:
Just head outside, and you’ll soon find out what
you need to do.
gym_denki_010_receptionist_08: Now get out there and have fun!
